title: Numbers picked by ChatGPT earn Michigan woman a $100,000 lottery prize
description: A Michigan woman used artificial intelligence program ChatGPT to generate a set of lottery numbers that earned her a $100,000 prize from a Powerball drawing.
content:
Oct. 16 (UPI) -- A Michigan woman used artificial intelligence program ChatGPT to generate a set of lottery numbers that earned her a $100,000 prize.
Tammy Carvey, 45, of Wyandotte, told Michigan Lottery officials she decided to buy a Powerball ticke... [919 chars]

title: US STOCKS-Wall St mixed; chipmakers rise after TSMC's results support AI optimism
description: Wall Street's main indexes were mixed on Thursday, as financial companies dragged while chip stocks extended their rally following a strong quarterly update from TSMC that reinforced investor optimism around AI. TSMC raised its full-year revenue forecast on a bullish outlook for spending on artificial intelligence.
content:

title: Low-paid human work behind programs
description: For a generative artificial intelligence system to learn how to write an autopsy report, human workers must sort and annotate thousands of crime scene images.
content:
Paris, France -- For a generative artificial intelligence system to learn how to write an autopsy report, human workers must sort and annotate thousands of crime scene images.
The precarious work of training AI, which generally pays just a few dollar... [9467 chars]

title: Dan Aykroyd says estates of late stars should be compensated for AI-generated videos
description: The “Ghostbusters” star and founding “SNL” cast-member says he’d be open to the idea as long as his estate is compensated for any likenesses created by artificial intelligence.
content:
Dan Aykroyd says he’s not opposed to an AI-generated alter ego extending his screen career into the afterlife.
The “Ghostbusters” star and founding “SNL” cast-member says he’d be open to the idea as long as his estate is compensated for any likenesse... [3090 chars]

title: Taiwanese chipmaker TSMC sees nearly 40% jump in its net profit thanks to the AI boom
description: Taiwan’s leading computer chip maker, TSMC, said that its net profit surged nearly 40% in the last quarter, boosted by the broad use of artificial intelligence.
content:
HONG KONG (AP) — Taiwan’s leading computer chip maker, TSMC, said Oct. 16 that its net profit surged nearly 40% in the last quarter, boosted by the surge in use of artificial intelligence.

title: Factbox-Opinions split over AI bubble after billions invested
description: (Reuters) -Companies announcing multi-billion dollar investments in artificial intelligence have raised concerns about the formation of a bubble reminiscent of the dotcom boom and bust.
content:
(Reuters) -Companies announcing multi-billion dollar investments in artificial intelligence have raised concerns about the formation of a bubble reminiscent of the dotcom boom and bust.

title: AI boom delivers record net profit for Taiwan's TSMC
description: TAIPEI — Taiwanese tech titan Taiwan Semiconductor Manufacturing Co. (TSMC) reported on Thursday a forecast-busting record net profit for the third quarter (Q3) on skyrocketing demand for microchips used to power iPhones and artificial intelligence (AI).

title: Microsoft Warns Russia, China And Iran Using AI As Cyber Weapon Against US
description: Russia, China, Iran and North Korea have sharply increased their use of artificial intelligence to deceive people online and mount cyberattacks against the United States, according to new research from Microsoft.
content:
